member.name: T:Bridge.Car
member.summary: Car class with properties Licensplate and date from the base class vehicle and methods to get price and vehicle type.

members.member:
standard constructor for Car class inheriting from vehicle class.
Base price is set to 230.

member.name: M:Bridge.Car.VehicleType
member.summary: Gets the type of the vehicle.
member.returns: A string representing the type of the vehicle in this case "Car".

members.member:

Base price is set to 120.

member.name: M:Bridge.MC.VehicleType
member.summary: Gets the type of the vehicle.

member.name: M:Bridge.vehicle.#ctor(System.String,System.DateTime,System.Boolean)
member.param: The date the ticket is issued

member.name: M:Bridge.vehicle.VehicleType
